outline:
1. to reject, despise, refuse
    1. (Qal)
      1. to reject, refuse
      2. to despise
    2. (Niphal) to be rejected
  2. (Niphal) to flow, run
kjv_def: abhor, cast away (off), contemn, despise, disdain, (become) loathe(some), melt away, refuse, reject, reprobate, [idiom] utterly, vile person.
